resources.string: This app will take you on a tour around our engineering campus. The goal of Clue Hunt is to find various QR codes placed at specific locations. We have provided you hints and pictures to help guide your journey. The faster you find the QR codes, the more points you will receive. Clues will be released an hour after meals are served.

Congrats, you\'ve finished our clue hunt! We hope you enjoyed your tour around our beautiful engineering campus. Stay tuned for announcements regarding prize winners. If you see yourself on the leaderboard, then you are guaranteed a prize. Enough of that, now get back to hacking :)
